Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.match

Class MatchManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.match.MatchManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
IndependentPlayerMatchManager, TeamMatchManager
public abstract class MatchManager extends Object
This Class represent the MatchManger

  • Method Details

    • startMatch

      public void startMatch(MatchVariant variant, List<String> playersNicknames, List<Wizard> wiz) throws InvalidPlayerCountException, IncorrectConstructorParametersException
      Constructs and sets up the match by adding all Players, initializing the TableManager and initializing the entrance for each Player
      Parameters:
      variant - (type MatchVariant) variant of the game chose by the first Player
      playersNicknames - (type List of String) Player's nicknames
      wiz - (type List of Wizard) chosen Wizards
      Throws:
      InvalidPlayerCountException - whenever the Player count isn't correct
      IncorrectConstructorParametersException - whenever the Parameters of the constructor aren't correct

    • getMatchVariant

      public MatchVariant getMatchVariant()
      Gets the match variant
      Returns:
      The match variant

    • runAction

      public void runAction(int AssistantCardIndex, Student studentToMove, int islandDestination, boolean moveToIsland, int motherNatureSteps, int cloudIdx) throws StudentMovementInvalidException, AssistantCardNotPlayableException, CloudPickInvalidException
      Manages the course of the game depending on the MatchPhase, executing a player action
      Parameters:
      AssistantCardIndex - (type int) Index of the AssistantCard to play
      studentToMove - (type Student) Student type to move
      islandDestination - (type int) Island's idx to move the Students to
      moveToIsland - (type boolean) Move to Island or to dining room
      motherNatureSteps - (type int) Steps to move mother nature
      cloudIdx - (type int) Cloud's idx from which to pick the Students
      Throws:
      StudentMovementInvalidException - whenever the Student's movement is not aloud
      AssistantCardNotPlayableException - whenever the AssistantCard is not aloud to be played
      CloudPickInvalidException - whenever the picked Cloud is not valid

    • moveToNextPlayer

      protected boolean moveToNextPlayer()
      Changes the currentPlayer to the next Player in the playerSortedByCurrentOrder and changes the MatchPhase according to the rules
      Returns:
      (type boolean) returns true if it needs to move the next Player in playerSortedByCurrentOrder

    • getPlayersSortedByRoundTurnOrder

      public List<Player> getPlayersSortedByRoundTurnOrder()
      Sorts the Players by the AssistantCard priority number (the lowest first) for the next round
      Returns:
      (type List of Player) the list of ordered Players

    • isAssistantCardPlayable

      public boolean isAssistantCardPlayable(int cardIdxForCurrentPlayer)
      Checks if the AssistantCard is playable by checking the card that has been played by the last Players is the same as the one he wants to play
      Parameters:
      cardIdxForCurrentPlayer - (type int) AssistantCard's index to check
      Returns:
      (type boolean) returns true if the AssistantCard is playable

    • purchaseCharacterCards

      public boolean purchaseCharacterCards(int cardIndex) throws CharacterCardAlreadyInUseException, CharacterCardIncorrectParametersException
      Purchase the CharacterCard
      Parameters:
      cardIndex - (type int) CharacterCard's index to purchase
      Returns:
      (type boolean) returns true if the CharacterCard is purchased correctly
      Throws:
      CharacterCardAlreadyInUseException - whenever the selected CharacterCard is already in use
      CharacterCardIncorrectParametersException - whenever the Parameters for the CharacterCard are not correct

    • useCharacterCard

      public int useCharacterCard(CharacterCardNetworkParamSet userInfo) throws CharacterCardIncorrectParametersException, CharacterCardNoMoreUsesAvailableException, CharacterCardNotPurchasedException
      Executes the relative effect of the CharacterCard that the Player played
      Parameters:
      userInfo - (type CharacterCardNetworkParamSet) CharacterCard's parameters
      Returns:
      (type int) played CharacterCard's index
      Throws:
      CharacterCardIncorrectParametersException - whenever the Parameters for the CharacterCard are not correct
      CharacterCardNoMoreUsesAvailableException - whenever the selected CharacterCard has no more uses
      CharacterCardNotPurchasedException - whenever the selected CharacterCard has not been purchased

    • addPlayer

      protected abstract void addPlayer(String nickname, Wizard wiz, int maxTowerCount, int initialCoins) throws InvalidPlayerCountException, IncorrectConstructorParametersException
      Initialize the Player and adds it to the list
      Parameters:
      nickname - (type String) Player's nickname
      wiz - (type Wizard) chosen Wizard
      maxTowerCount - (type int) max number of Tower
      initialCoins - (type int) the number of coins the Player owns at the beginning of the game. Set it to -1 when the Coins feature is disabled
      Throws:
      IncorrectConstructorParametersException - whenever the parameters aren't correct
      InvalidPlayerCountException - whenever the Player count isn't correct

      public abstract List<Player> getAllPlayers()
      Gets all the Players of the Match
      Returns:
      (type List of Player) returns all the Players

      Gets just the Players with Tower
      Returns:
      (type List of Player) returns all the Players

    • getPlayerTeamName

      protected abstract String getPlayerTeamName(Player player)
      Retrieves the team name for a Player, in case the Match is team based
      Parameters:
      player - The Player for which to find the team name
      Returns:
      null if the Match is not team-based, else the name of the team the Player belongs to

      Throws:

      Throws:

    • getPlayerControllingIsland

      protected abstract Player getPlayerControllingIsland() throws IslandSkippedInfluenceForStopCardException
      Finds the Player that should control the current Island
      Returns:
      The Player that should take ownership of the Island
      Throws:
      IslandSkippedInfluenceForStopCardException

    • getInfluenceOfPlayer

      protected int getInfluenceOfPlayer(Player player) throws IslandSkippedInfluenceForStopCardException
      Computes the influence of the player on the current Island
      Parameters:
      player - The Player you want to compute the influence of
      Returns:
      The influence number of the Player on the current island
      Throws:
      IslandSkippedInfluenceForStopCardException - If the Island influence computation was skipped due to a StopCard being present on the Island

    • changeIslandControl

      protected void changeIslandControl(Player to) throws IslandSkippedControlAssignmentForStopCardException
      Changes control of the current island to the destination player, unifying it with adjacent ones if necessary
      Parameters:
      to - The PLayer that takes control of the Island
      Throws:
      IslandSkippedControlAssignmentForStopCardException - If the Island control swap was skipped due to a StopCard being present on the Island

    • roundCheckMatchEnd

      private void roundCheckMatchEnd()
      Check the Match End conditions: Player has no more Towers, no Students left in the bag, no more AssistantCards available
